title: MediaPlayer fails opening .MKV from URL in Creators Update
body: We have a MediaPlayer that works with OneDrive MKV streams in previous versions but not in Creators Update.

comments.body: Thanks for your reply. To reproduce the problem please try following:

Hello Clint, providing a file URL is going to be a bit difficult as these URLs are obtained from OneDrive API and they expire after some minutes. Maybe you could obtain some test URLs coordinating with OneDrive team?.
Can you provide a source file URL we can validate?  Does this happen on all MKV, certain MKVs?

Hello, we have tested the app on a machine still running Anniversary Update and works fine. The MediaPlayerElement control can play the files from the URLs but this has stopped working on Creators Update.
is this a media player control?  do you have a repro?
